mapper.select: SELECT c.carbon_no, c.region_code, c.nation_code, GREATEST(NVL(c.carbon_emissions, 0) - NVL((SELECT SUM(s.score) FROM users u JOIN score s ON u.user_no = s.user_no WHERE u.country = c.nation_code GROUP BY u.country ), 0) , 0) AS carbon_emissions FROM carbon c ORDER BY carbon_emissions
